description: In May 2022, Morris+Company move to their new home in Mare Street, Hackney. The studio will occupy three inter-connecting floors of a converted warehouse, prioritising low intervention, circular and environmental principles throughout.

factsheet.heading: Exploring a Circular Strategy at Mare St
paragraphs: join Moco at the opening of their new home in the heart of hackney. The project has been designed around the principals of sustainable strategies for re-use, recycling and flexibility, alongside a vision to create a place which would enable/engender/encourage a sense of interaction with the local community and wider public; through a ground level street fronting event and exhibition space, replete with a fully plant based restaurant space. The event will feature a 20 minute presentation by members of the team, followed by a walking tour of the spaces.

name: 215 Mare Street
